name: QA Lead
description:
We are looking for the QA Lead, a real QA expert and test management guru who will contribute to our success by setting up automated and manual testing, managing QA processes, and reporting on the quality assurance of our products to ensure they are functional and provide the best experience to our users.

About the company:

aqua cloud GmbH is a German IT company and Saas-solution provider under the Andagon GmbH holding, Germany’s No. 1 in IT quality assurance.

The company currently has 2 live and successfully running Saas products - DrivT and aqua.

Our products:

DrivT is a freemium SaaS helping quickly arrange testing processes, enhance software quality and reduce development costs. We call it 'Trello for QAs'.

aqua is a premium Saas/on-premise test management tool for Medium+/Enterprise size businesses. It is used by 100+ enterprise businesses in Europe, including banks, insurances, retailers, municipal, government, and IT companies (for example, European Google office).

Current Stack of Technologies:
.NET Core 3.1, .NET Framework 4.7.2, Selenium, SpecFlow, PowerShell, GitHub Actions, Azure Pipeline, Jenkins

Responsibilities:

— Lead 3 QA engineers

— Track quality assurance metrics and create test reports

— Develop test strategies, plans, and maintain automation test data
— Develop and continuously improve automated tests when new system features and enhancements are developed
— Ensure the appropriate test environments and infrastructures are in place and kept up to date
— Assist in the identification, selection, and implementation of tools, technologies, and practices that support the overall QA process
— Review code of automated tests
— Participate in requirements analysis and review
— Manage, establish, enhance and execute system, functional, data, integration, user acceptance, performance, API, and regression testing of our web-based solutions (aqua, DrivT)
— Perform manual test execution
— Work in a dynamic Agile based environment
— Interact with other team members to increase the efficiency of the testing procedures
— Demonstrate a passion for building high-quality software, love solving problems, and facing new challenges

Requirements:

— 4+ years of total experience in QA

— 1+ years of proven experience in leading a team of QA engineers

— 1+ years of experience in Automation testing (any tool, language), building frameworks, and developing testing tools

— Background in automation using an object-oriented programming language

— Basic experience in Performance testing

— Passion for quality and in-depth knowledge of QA methodology and tools

— Proficiency in planning and coordination of teamwork

— Hands-on experience with testing artifacts: test plan, test design, test case, test script

— Experience with WEB, API, and DB testing

— Knowledge of basic modern software engineering process principles: version control systems, issue tracking, continuous integration, release lifecycle, etc

— Ability to make decisions and take responsibility

— Good written and verbal communication skills (B1+)

— Willingness to pitch ideas and test new approaches

Nice to have:

— Experience with CI/CD

— Experience with BDD / Gherkin

— Experience with .NET/C#, PowerShell, and Selenium

We offer you:

  • Challenges and creative tasks in a stable and constantly growing German IT company
  • Salary and money, of course :). In Euro
  • A friendly, professional, and 'remote first' international team working with the newest technologies
  • Conferences, workshops, certifications
  • Covered vacation and sick days
  • All required instruments, tools, and environment to achieve your goals
  • Opportunity for the professional development and growth
